name: Super Ramen Shop: The Great Funhouse Caper
name_original: Super Ramen Shop: The Great Funhouse Caper
description:
**This is a work in progress so there will be a few bugs I'm sure but please Enjoy this demo and feedback's always welcome**

  This was a side project I started on stream about a week ago that began to take on a life of its own I'm really happy with how this is turning out but we still have a bit to go. I wanted to try my hand at making a speed game so here we are,  Welcome to Nina's Fun House.

Controls(Keyboard)

Move  = Arrow Keys

Jump = Space

Sprint = (Hold Z while Moving)

Interact = E

Roll = W

Controls(Control pad)

Move = D Pad

Jump = A

Sprint = (Hold B while Moving)

Interact = B

Roll = RightBumper

 Later updates to include: Sound, Music
